title: A Cold December Morning
description: In this Dateline classic, a mother of five is found dead in her Washington State home. But what leaves detectives the most shocked is the way she is found. Keith Morrison reports. Originally aired on NBC on July 12, 2013.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
